page.title: 09SECTION 4 - POOLEY BRIDGE
page.content: HOME LIFE - Cooking in all houses by electricity or calor gas. No Mains Gas connected to the village. Heating by coal fires, electricity, oil or calor gas. High proportion of households keep a dog or a cat. INFORMATION - Tourist Information caravan open in the car park Easter to Sept. Average 22,000 enquiries per year. Travelling Library 3rd Thursday each month. LANDSCAPE & BUILDINGS - Mostly rural. Stone built Village Hall l9l2. Church built l869. Local stone widely used for older buildings. LAW & ORDER - Resident policeman employed part-time in the village and surrounding district and part-time in Penrith LIFE STYLE - 3 hotels serving meals to non-residents. Summer months l Restaurant offering take-away meals.
